resources.post: If you would like to see the Real Face of jesus go to my web Site http://www.shroud-image.com This Image came to me throud the Shroud, there is nothing more real about the Shroud than the Image (Face) i have produced simply through my Camera. There is no need for further investigation into the Shroud as this proves its authanticity. The Face came out of the Shroud.
